DOC.detailed_description: This research study examine feasibility use in-vehicle mobile technology monitoring system measure teen secondary task engagement on-road driving outcome measure web-based intervention prevent risky driving novice teen driver . Approximately 20 teen license less 90 day enrol evaluated baseline , ~1 week ~4 week . Participants complete intervention ~1 week assessment . This study provide information feasibility web-based intervention prevent risky drive estimation effect size intervention cell phone use driving .
